attributes.action: Reinvent the House of Lords into a democratic institution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to get the Government to reinvent the House of Lords into a democratic institution, in which all members are elected by the public and serve fixed terms. This will allow the House of Commons and House of Lords to work with the same efficiency that the American Senate and Congress work.

rejection.details: Your petition may no longer be relevant - The PM has recently outlined proposals for reform Please read: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19582
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
